    • Constructor Detail

      • EffectRay

        public EffectRay(float posX,
                 float posY,
                 float angle,
                 int length,
                 int width,
                 float vel,
                 int lifeCycles,
                 java.awt.Color color)
        Constructs a EffectRay object
        Parameters:
        posX - x coordinate of source position
        posY - y coordinate of source position
        angle - angle of the direction (radians measured from top, clockwise)
        length - initial length of the ray (it will grow rapidly)
        width - width of the ray
        vel - velocity of the beginning of the ray
        lifeCycles - number of cycles the ray should be displayed
        color - color of the ray

        The rendering of the GameObject happens in this method
